author: Jon Porter
title: Uber launches new delivery services as demand for ride-hailing plummets
description: Uber is launching two new services called Uber Connect and Uber Direct as the COVID-19 pandemic minimizes demand for its traditional ride-hailing business. Both are focussed on moving deliveries rather than people.
content:
Connect and Direct are about moving packages, not people 
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Uber is launching a pair of new services called Uber Connect and Uber Direct as the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic minimizes demand for its traditional ride-hailing… [+2227 chars]
